ut hereby renounces his love of nh.
1month ago,when days were marching towards april,ut gave himself a deadline,it being the day nh hits the 400k mark.the thrill of discovering old relics,seeing comments of people from 2015-16, it's just ineffably warm and lonesome.like a fireplace in some cabin deep in a snow-clad lothlórien
."everything that truly happens,happens to me"(Garden of forking path)
solipsism,solipsism...ut is such an egotist sometimes.
ut really liked this place, that's all ut wants to convey.and ut loves y'all.everyone-neto,vanilla, guro,voyeurism etc readers.everyone in here.even the octogenerion creeps leafing through loli h.
ut's 20 years ol' already,years just days by.Literature doesn't help,other than being a past-time recreation.
but he is grateful for sentienceness.ut has had enough of all the  whining.
Tl;dr-ut thinks it's time to move on.ut will always treasure the feeling anent this place.
ut loves y'all.he just wanted to leave something,a part of him,here:)
